Package de.lessvoid.nifty.loaderv2

Class NiftyLoader

java.lang.Object
de.lessvoid.nifty.loaderv2.NiftyLoader
public class NiftyLoader extends Object
This is the Nifty-Loader that is supposed to take care of loading all the XML definitions used by the Nifty-GUI. Its able to read the definition and style data from XML files and apply it to its parent Nifty-GUI instance.

    • NiftyLoader

      public NiftyLoader(@Nonnull Nifty nifty, @Nonnull TimeProvider timeProvider)
      Create a new instance of the Nifty-Loader.
      Parameters:
      nifty - the assigned Nifty-GUI instance
      timeProvider - the time provider that is used to measure the performance

  • Method Details

    • loadNiftyXml

      @Nonnull public NiftyType loadNiftyXml(@Nonnull String schemaId, @Nonnull @WillClose InputStream inputStreamXml) throws Exception
      Load a Nifty-GUI XML file and get the type that is defined in the file. The XML file needs to be a valid XML GUI definition.
      Parameters:
      schemaId - the name of the schema that should be used to validate the XML file
      inputStreamXml - the input stream of the XML file, this stream will be closed by this function
      Returns:
      the NiftyType that was load from the XML file
      Throws:
      Exception - in case the loading fails at any point
